version_description:
［NePLAYER Lite - a new music player allows you to define your own music listening styles］
NePLAYER Lite playbacks Hi-Res music. NePLAYER Lite is a music playback application which offers add-on functions. You can separately purchase Hi-Res playback function for your music listening needs. Surround and advanced equalizer functions can be used freely.

We would like to express our special gratitude for purchasing and using our NePLAYER Lite.
 
NePLAYER Lite v1.0.3 Update includes followings,
- Added a setting function for the maximum sampling frequencies.
- Added a editing function for the contributed text to the Twitter.
- Added new function for Alarm and Off-timer.
- Added a function to edit music in the play list.
- Fixed bugs.

Enjoying your favorite music with NePLAYER LIte.

We would like to express our special gratitude for purchasing and using our NePLAYER Lite.

- Become compatible with our external storage devices.
- Fixed bugs.

NePLAYER Lite v1.2.7 Update includes followings,
- Added support for Apple Music
Stream your favorite music from playlists, searches, and For You items!

- Fixed bugs.

Enjoying your favorite music with NePLAYER Lite.

We would like to express our special gratitude for purchasing and using our NePLAYER Lite.

NePLAYER Lite v1.2.10 Update includes followings,

- New UI is released first!
Only for iOS version, the new design version of NePLAYER is released in advance!
The UI design has been updated to enjoy high resolution and streaming services even more.

- Added sharing to Instagram Stories
Added a function to post the playback screen of NePLAYER to Instagram Stories using the service of Instagram App.
Now you can share your playing screen and share your favorite music!

Enjoying your favorite music with NePLAYER. New UI has launched! "NePLAYER" is a music application which comes from an ease of use concept allows users to replay Hi-Res music in just a touch.

We would like to express our special gratitude for purchasing and using our NePLAYER Lite.

NePLAYER v1.2.11 Update includes followings,

(1) Serious bug fix
Fixed a fatal bug regarding the tab bar menu, library playback function, and streaming playback function. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

(2) Fixed the display problem on the Apple Music subscription screen.

※Notice
We have confirmed that the latest version of Homepod has a problem that APP is crashing when playing Homepod.
We are currently fixing bugs, so please refrain from playing APPs using Homepod.
In addition, we are planning an update to improve the inconvenience caused by the change from the old UI to the new UI.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We will update it again, so please wait for the update.

Enjoy your favorite music with NePLAYER!

We would like to express our special gratitude for purchasing and using our NePLAYER Lite.

NePLAYER v1.3.0 Update includes followings,

(1) bug fix
Fixed long loading bug before playing.


※Notice
We have confirmed that the latest version of Homepod has a problem that APP is crashing when playing Homepod.
We are currently fixing bugs, so please refrain from playing APPs using Homepod.
In addition, we are planning an update to improve the inconvenience caused by the change from the old UI to the new UI.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We will update it again, so please wait for the update.

Enjoy your favorite music with NePLAYER!

非常感谢您使用NePLAYER Lite

[NePLAYER V1.3.1更新内容]
(1) 改善了崩溃问题
移至新用户界面时，我们已解决了这些问题


※注意
我们已经确认最新版本的Homepod存在播放Homepod时APP崩溃的问题。
我们目前正在修复错误，因此请不要使用Homepod玩APP。
此外，我们正在计划进行更新，以改善从旧版UI更改为新版UI带来的不便。
我们对造成的任何不便表示歉意。 我们将再次对其进行更新，因此请等待更新。

使用NePLAYER欣赏您最喜欢的音乐！


新的用户界面已经启动！
请继续使用我们的NePLAYER聆听美妙的音乐。
